llm_res.rule: The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
Every ERC-721 compliant contract must implement the ERC721 and ERC165 interfaces.
llm_res.function: The provided contract implements ERC721 and ERC165 interfaces correctly.

llm_res.rule: MUST trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
allowance function should return the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
